title: Provide live deployment link and shareable QR code

requirements.text: After publishing the current build live on the Internet Computer, provide the live production URL as a user-facing link that can be copied.

quotes: Yes and can you give me a link and qr code

acceptanceCriteria: The app is deployed successfully and loads from a stable production URL.
The production URL is captured in a single configurable place in the frontend (e.g., env/config) rather than hard-coded across multiple components.
Users can view the production URL in the UI and copy it to the clipboard with clear success feedback in English.

requirements.text: Add an in-app share surface (e.g., in Settings/About) that displays a QR code encoding the live production URL and allows downloading the QR as an image.

quotes: Yes and can you give me a link and qr code

acceptanceCriteria: A QR code is rendered in the UI that, when scanned, resolves to the production URL from REQ-1.
The share surface includes a visible text link of the same URL and a one-click copy action.
Users can download/save the QR code as an image file (e.g., PNG) from the browser.
All user-facing labels, buttons, and messages are in English.

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo; do not introduce additional backend services.
Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui (shadcn) directly; compose components instead.
Do not edit immutable hook/bootstrap files listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (e.g., frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts(x), frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx).
nonGoals: Adding third-party authentication providers beyond Internet Identity.
Generating or storing QR codes via the backend canister.
